subject: World Cup (Skiing)
Skiing
Alpine Skiing
lead_paragraph: Lindsey Vonn was denied a three-win weekend sweep by three-hundredths of a second as Maria Höfl-Riesch of Germany won a super-combined event Sunday in St. Moritz, Switzerland.
snippet: Lindsey Vonn was denied a three-win weekend sweep by three-hundredths of a second as Maria Höfl-Riesch of Germany won a super-combined event Sunday in St. Moritz, Switzerland.
